snippet: A 14-year-old, who investigators said may have been teased by the boy who was stabbed, was arrested in the attack at Intermediate School 117.
abstract: Police say 14-year-old Timothy Crump, student at Intermediate School 117 in the Bronx, was stabbed to death by classmate in front of school building at end of day; Noel Estevez has been arrested and charged as adult with second-degree murder and second-degree manslaughter.

byline.original: By ASHLEY SOUTHALL and COLIN MOYNIHAN
byline.contributor: J. David Goodman and Javier C. Hernández contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: A 14-year-old, who investigators said may have been teased by the boy who was stabbed, was arrested in the attack at Intermediate School 117.

headline.main: Boy, 14, Fatally Stabs Schoolmate in Bronx, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Boy, 14, Fatally Stabs Schoolmate in Bronx, Police Say
